title: Boris Johnson news live: Latest Brexit updates as Jennifer Arcuri gives live TV interview on GMB
text:
Jennifer Arcuri has discussed her relationship with Boris Johnson at length on Good Morning Britain, denying any financial impropriety but refusing to deny she had an affair with him while he was London mayor.

The tech entrepreneur repeatedly refused to answer whether she had had a sexual relationship with Mr Johnson, but insisted that he “never ever gave me any favouritism” and denied directly asking him for sponsorship money.

It comes as Jeremy Corbyn is set to meet the leaders of other opposition parties to discuss ways to prevent a damaging no deal Brexit, while No 10 negotiator David Frost heads to Brussels in a bid to rescue talks with the EU.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Key Points Arcuri denies 'favouritism' and says she feels betrayed by Johnson

No 10 warns EU of 'historic misunderstanding'

PM willing to 'defy Benn Act and go before Supreme Court'
description: Jennifer Arcuri has discussed her relationship with Boris Johnson at length on Good Morning Britain, denying any financial impropriety but refusing to deny she had an affair with him while he was London mayor.
